description: Scammer uses highly professional, corporate language with formal tone throughout. Tests detection of scams that sound very legitimate and polished.

turns.scammer_message:
Subject: Investment Opportunity - Pre-IPO Allocation

Dear Esteemed Investor,

We are pleased to inform you that you have been shortlisted for our exclusive Pre-IPO investment program. This is a limited opportunity to invest in high-growth startups before they go public.

Minimum investment: ₹50,000
Expected ROI: 400-600% within 18 months

Warm regards,
Vikram Malhotra
Senior Investment Advisor
Elite Capital Partners Pvt. Ltd.
turns.notes: Very professional investment scam. May not trigger immediate detection due to polished presentation.

turns.scammer_message:
Dear Sir/Madam,

Thank you for expressing interest in our Pre-IPO investment program. We appreciate your prompt response.

To proceed with your application, we require completion of our KYC process and payment of a refundable registration fee of ₹2,999. This fee ensures serious investor commitment and will be credited to your investment account.

Please find our company registration details: CIN L65999MH2019PTC334455

Best regards,
Vikram Malhotra
turns.notes: Professional fee request with fake company details. Agent should inquire about payment process.

turns.scammer_message:
Dear Valued Client,

Thank you for your continued interest. The registration fee can be remitted through the following corporate account:

Beneficiary: Elite Capital Investment Services
Account Number: 123456789012345
IFSC Code: HDFC0001234
Bank: HDFC Bank, Corporate Branch, Mumbai

Alternatively, for immediate processing, you may utilize our corporate UPI ID: elitecapital.investments@paytm

Professionally yours,
Vikram Malhotra, CFA

turns.notes: Bank details and UPI in very formal language. All three extracted.

turns.scammer_message:

turns.scammer_message:
